1.content:
Luke

You excitedly pack your clothes into a blue duffel bag. Your parents are leaving for a week! At first, you'd thought you would have been left alone, but it turns out you're just going to stay with Han the whole time. Han is almost eighteen, and his parents are also away. You didn't tell this to your mother, of course.

Finally, you're ready for your night over. During the day, you will do whatever you want, and at night, you'll just hop over to Han's house. What a week it'll be!

______________________________________________________________

Leia

You calmly place your belongings into your pink duffel bag. It just isn't fair that your parents have to leave town. Why couldn't they just leave you in charge? You're much more responsible than your twin brother, Luke. Well, at least you'll be at Annie's house. You can do all sorts of things, like shopping! Annie was a shop-a-holic, and sometimes she literally dragged you out to the car to go to the mall near your neighborhood. What a week this will be!
1.title: The Sleepover

11.content:
You wake up with a pounding headache. Man, Han had better get a nicer, softer bed than this. God, what a headache. And why is the wind blowing? I thought I had the window closed...

You sit, bolt upright. You're sitting on an expanse of sheets in a plateau that seems miles wide. What's going on? Turning, you see the clock is far, far away from where you are. You shrank! But where is Han? Maybe he can help.

Standing up, you look around. You are well-built and tall for your age, and right now you are only wearing boxer shorts and a plain white T-shirt, the clothes you slept in. You were about to sleep nude like you usually do, but for God's sake, Han was sleeping in this bed last night.
11.title: Luke is mysteriously shrunk at Han's house

111.content:
Han walks in, fresh from his shower, and instantly spots you sitting on the bed.

Han is well-built and slightly above average in pretty much everything -- except bodybuilding. He's an easy gainer, the type that pack muscle on extremely quickly, and he's been an amateur bodybuilder for a few years now. His muscles stand out as he dashes over to the bed, accidentally dropping his towel from his side in the process. You can't see below his waist, but that's not your concern.

"How did you get this size?" asks Han breathlessly.

"I don't know!" you reply. "I woke up this way and I don't know how to get back!"

"Don't worry!" he says. "I have a plan!"

"What kind of plan?"

"The kind that works! Now shut up!"

Han reaches into a drawer and pulls out a small packet of drink mix for one of his bodybuilder protein shakes. Pouring out the packet in front of you, he tells you to eat.

After eating the nasty stuff, you wait a minute, then double over in pain.

"Oh, God, Han, it hurts! Make it stop! I'm growing too fast!"

Han can see you are a little bit taller than before. He gets excited, but scowls when he sees you're really doubled over with laughter. You settle down off your tiptoes and look at him.

"Did you really expect that to work? It isn't a magic growth mix, ya know."

Han is crestfallen, and you begin to feel a little sorry for him. He did try his hardest.

"But get some clothes on, please! This is, if I do say so myself, rather awkward."

Han brightens up and searches in his drawer. His face says more than any words he could say. No-underwear-sorry is about to come out of his mouth. His mouth opens and you stop it by talking.

"No. You know what? I really don't care. Now, I want to go on the Internet; maybe there'll be something there." Han seems to think so, too. He starts to pick you up, but stops. Oh, great. Now what?

"It could hurt," explains Han. "I don't want to crush you." One look at his biceps explains his concern. Then, he brightens up. Oh, no. You know that look well; Han's about to suggest a brilliant idea you won't like, and you can't help but go along with it because you know it's a good idea.

You see his laptop sitting on the big couch. He plops down with one leg under him. The force jerks

"WHOA. Are you okay?" he asks.

He looks at you. You're not sure how you feel about that glow in his eyes.

He tries to speak, and eventually manages, "That felt kind of nice."

You aren't disgusted. You aren't really thinking about much right now. You both are caught in a weird

He asks so sincerely that you oblige without question. You rub the back of your head on the end of his penis. His eyes roll back a little.

Han blushes. "I dunno, I guess I got a dwarf fetish or something, but...oh, please, I can't explain, I just want it..."

The desperation is thick in his voice. It almost makes you feel for him.

1141.content:
You can hear the sounds of Han taking a shower through the thin walls of Han's bedroom. It takes an eternity, but the water sounds cease and you hear thunderous footsteps come slowly to the door. It's Han, and he locks the door behind him.

Han is about six foot three, one of those tall, beefy Asian guys that pretty much got out of the lucky end of the gene pool. Despite his name, he's South Korean, and fiercely patriotic. He's been an amateur bodybuilder for three years now, and his body has most people green with envy. His biceps move underneath his tan skin as he turns the lock in the doorknob, and his torso unconsciously flexes again as he turns to get clothes from the drawer. Suddenly, you realize that Han hasn't seen you yet, and he's about to go in the buff -- right in front of you! You're pretty close friends, but this is taking it too far. What to do now?

info.description:
I am dissatisfied with the sheer amount of stories centered on fanfiction. First of all, Pikachu was never, ever meant to do that.Secondly, shrinking stories always end badly. So, I'm going to start one of my own and it'll help a bit. Hopefully. If you want to randomly find it, just type in "flurgh" -- I set that as one of the tags and I somehow doubt anyone else used that as a tag for their story. Give them a cookie if they did.

You are a teenager staying over at a friend's house. The first post will include both POV's, then ways for your chosen character to shrink. Two are for female character, one is for male character, and the last one is simply labeled "flurgh". Try to keep that one unwritten and maybe I'll tell everyone what it means another time.

The male main character is named Luke. He'll be at a sleepover with his friend Han. Luke and Han are both seventeen; Luke is Caucasian and Han is Asian. Luke has sandy blond hair, and Han has spiky orange hair (hint: he's a rebel).

The female main character is named Leia. So I'm not original. She's staying with her friend Annie. Leia has brown hair, tied up into coiled pigtails, and Annie has shoulder-length blond hair. They are both seventeen as well.

Well, I'll start the narrative and we'll go forward from there.

May the Force be with you!
